name: latex-helper
description: Adds some utilities for writing in LaTeX. Primarily aimed at math articles.
author: Aritra Bhowmick

commands.title: LaTeX Helper: Sort bib file by citation keys
LaTeX Helper: Check bib file for duplicate citation keys
LaTeX Helper: Add new entries to bib file MathSciNet or ArXiV IDs
LaTeX Helper: Convert all citation keys

latex-helper.inputTextHighlightColor.description: Color to highlight the text inside \input{}.

latex-helper.importDirectoryTextHighligh.description: Color to highlight the directory inside \import{dir}{filename}.

latex-helper.importFilenameTextHighlight.description: Color to highlight the filename inside \import{dir}{filename}.

latex-helper.importPdfTexTextHighlightCo.description: Color to highlight the extension inside \import{dir}{filename.pdf_tex}.

latex-helper.figureEnvironmentSnippet.description: The figure environment. #mul, #dir and #filename will be replaces in runtime. The ${n:} will define tabstops in the snippet.

latex-helper.inkscapeExportCommand.description: The command for compiling SVG to pdf_tex. #executable, #pdf, #svg will be replaced in the runtime.

latex-helper.svgWidth.description: Default width of the SVG canvas.

latex-helper.svgHeight.description: Default height of the SVG canvas.

latex-helper.citationKeyFormat.description: Choose the format for generating citation keys

latex-helper.replacements.markdownDescription: A dictionary of word replacements. Works only if `latex-helper.citationKeyFormat` is set to `Authors_Title`

latex-helper.commonWords.markdownDescription: List of common words to be ignored during citation key generation. Works only if `latex-helper.citationKeyFormat` is set to `Authors_Title`

latex-helper.wordsCutoff.markdownDescription: Ignore title words after this cutoff. Works only if `latex-helper.citationKeyFormat` is set to `Authors_Title`

latex-helper.authorCutoff.markdownDescription: Cutoff author names. Works only if `latex-helper.citationKeyFormat` is set to `AuthorsYear`

latex-helper.autosortBibFile.description: Automatically sorts the entries in the bib file upon adding new ones.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
